resources.string: Where should I send your messages?
Where should I send your messages?
Currently we only support Google\'s OAuth protocol. Please press the button below, then give grants to use your Gmail account for sending emails.\n
Authorization was successful. Please press the button below to return to the main page of the application.\n
An error occurred while authenticating/authorising, please contact us at info@tinywebgears.com for help.\n
An internal error occurred while sending email: %s
